source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_00<tab>Unfazed by events that would shatter the mind of a lesser man, Hildibrand stands ready to begin his next case.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_00<tab>嘆きの海 南にいるヒルディブランドは、意気込んでいるようだ。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_01<tab>Inspector's Log:
After being hauled into the sky and stuffed into a cramped space like so much airship baggage, I have at last convinced my amiable captor to release me from his custody. Master PuPu is not of this star─as was evinced by his unintelligible tongue and unfathomable technology─yet with the help of a preternaturally talented associate, I have deduced that the matter which brought him to our star is a cause worthy of investigation. Fear not, fellow sentient beings, for otherworldly origins notwithstanding, Hildibrand Helidor Maximilian Manderville is a friend to one and all!
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
None the worse for wear after his extraterrestrial escapade, Hildibrand is eager to embark on a new case. Before his “channeling” can produce a viable lead, however, your recent Loporrit guide arrives to report a nearby sighting of...Hildibrand. Several moments of confusion and logical reasoning later, it is determined that one of the clones escaped PuPu's vaporization beam, and is now running loose somewhere on the moon. Hildibrand insists upon eliminating this impostor inspector before any damage can be done to the Manderville name.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_01<tab>ヒルディブランドと話したところ、きんきんレポリットが駆けてきた。複製されたヒルディブランドが残っていたので、消去するため探すことになった。嘆きの海 北で「ヒルディブランド」と話し、同行させよう。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_02<tab>With eyes peeled for gentlemanly tracks, you set off in search of the defective clone. Considering the chaos which routinely erupts around the original, even a slightly shoddy imitation should not be too hard to find...

※You must be accompanied by Hildibrand and Nashu to complete this task. Speak with either of them again in the north of Mare Lamentorum should you become separated.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_02<tab>ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れて、複製の手がかりを探し始めた。ふたりを連れた状態で、嘆きの海 北で手がかりを探そう。

※同行状態が解除された場合、嘆きの海 北の「ヒルディブランド」か「ナシュ・マカラッカ」に話しかけることで同行を再開できます。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_03<tab>You stumble across a thinker whose last thought seems to have been interrupted by the sudden and violent interjection of a goldsmithing hammer. This does not, however, appear to have been the work of the clone. The search continues...

※You must be accompanied by Hildibrand and Nashu to complete this task. Speak with either of them again in the north of Mare Lamentorum should you become separated.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_03<tab>シンカーに刺さったハンマーを見つけたが、複製の手がかりではないようだ。ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れた状態で、嘆きの海 北で手がかりを探そう。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_04<tab>You find another victim of blunt force trauma, but again, no sign of the fugitive clone. Though you resolve to press on with the search, one would be forgiven for wondering if you've stumbled upon the trail of a serial killer with an endless supply of hammers...

※You must be accompanied by Hildibrand and Nashu to complete this task. Speak with either of them again in the north of Mare Lamentorum should you become separated.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_04<tab>ムースに刺さったハンマーを見つけたが、複製の手がかりではないようだ。ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れた状態で、嘆きの海 北で手がかりを探そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_05<tab>The discovery of fancy footprints at last leads you to the object of your hunt. No sooner have you spotted the clone, however, when an all but in the altogether Godbert appears out of nowhere, and proceeds to demonstrate a cataclysmic level of Manderville affection for his beloved son. After the dust settles and the music stops, PuPu vaporizes the flawed duplicate, marking the end of one of the inspector's active cases. Godbert, meanwhile, is relieved to find the genuine Hildibrand in relatively good health. He offers his gratitude for your part in seeing his boy's soul safely reunited with his body, and expresses a desire to consult with you back in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Something regarding a certain rare ore he located on the moon... Agreeing with the idea of heading starward, Hildibrand is eager to continue the search for PuPu's comrade closer to home.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_05<tab>紳士的な足跡を発見し、複製されたヒルディブランドを発見した。そこにゴッドベルトが現れ、親子は感動の再会を果たし、複製も消去された。探していた鉱石を得たというゴッドベルトは、冒険者に頼みがあるという。ラザハンのエーテライト・プラザで「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_06<tab>Returned to the relative normalcy of Thavnair, Hildibrand resumes the Case of the Silent Correspondent with Nashu and PuPu in tow. Delion holds back, however, and divulges to you his intention to investigate the little blue man and his diabolical devices. Even as you tacitly agree to assist the editor in chief, you are approached by Godbert with yet another request for aid. It seems the master goldsmith has turned his hand to armaments─a change brought on by the terrible events of the Final Days─and he now seeks to craft superior weapons as described in an ancient manual of Manderville family legacy. Should you have time to help gather the necessary materials, you are to alert Godbert's manservant...who will be waiting patiently nearby. For as long as it takes.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SEQ_06<tab>ヒルディブランドと話し、彼らはコヨコヨの仲間の捜索に向かった。デリオンは独自でコヨコヨの取材を続けるらしく、次回の協力を頼まれた。ゴッドベルトは、マンダヴィルウェポン製作に力をかしてほしいという。都合のいいときに、「マンダヴィル家の使用人」に声をかけよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hildibrand and have him accompany you.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_00<tab>ヒルディブランドと話して同行させる

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_01<tab>Search for clues while Hildibrand and Nashu are accompanying you.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_01<tab>ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れて
手がかりを探す

TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_02<tab>ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れて
再度手がかりを探す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_03<tab>Search for even more clues while Hildibrand and Nashu are accompanying you.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_03<tab>ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカを連れて
さらに手がかりを探す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hildibrand in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_TODO_04<tab>ラザハンのヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_100_000<tab>Mister PuPu's eyes make me feel dizzy. Like swirls that go around and around and around and around...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_100_000<tab>コヨコヨさん、つぶらな瞳がかわいいです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_100_001<tab>This Echo power of yours sounds...extraordinary. You must allow me to interview you once we've put this business on the moon behind us.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_100_001<tab>あなたの持つ「超える力」という超能力は非常に興味深い。
異星人の件が落ち着いたら、ぜひ取材させてください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_100_002<tab>I am glad you are here to help ward off any more...PuPu...misunderstandings.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_100_002<tab>コヨコヨ……みんなの言葉、わからない。
キミと話すことできて、助かった。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>So begins “The Case of the Silent Correspondent”!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_000<tab>さあ、コヨコヨ殿のお友達の捜索を開始しますぞ……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_001<tab>Uh...not to rain on your parade, but “my friend who was somewhere on your star stopped sending me messages” is not a lot to go on.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_001<tab>あのう、水を差すようで悪いのですが……
我々の星で消息を絶ったという、漠然とした情報だけで、
どうやって異星人を探すのでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_002<tab>I've spent years investigating the existence of aliens, and recent experiences notwithstanding, they are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> that easy to find.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_002<tab>私、長年にわたって異星人の取材をしてきましたが、
そう簡単に見つかるものではありませんよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_003<tab>Then you don't know Inspector Hildibrand! He'll solve this case as he's solved countless others: with unerring perception and panache!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_003<tab>ヒルディブランド様は凄い方なんです！
きっと今回も、大胆不敵で華麗に解決してくれますよ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>Ah...hahaha, well said, Nashu! I need but relinquish conscious thought to investigative instinct, and the clues will flow to me forthwith!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>は、ハッハッハ、その通りですぞ！
事件屋の勘を研ぎ澄まし、手がかりをキャッチしてみせます……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_005<tab>Lose yourself in the deductive current, Inspector!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_005<tab>ヒルディブランド様、がんばってください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_006<tab><gasp> You're <var 1A 02 /var>channeling<var 1A 01 /var>, aren't you!? Contacting a higher power to breach the veil of mystery? Another fascinating development.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_006<tab>ハッ、それはもしかして「チャネリング」ですかッ！？
高次の存在と交信して、解を得ようとしている？
これまた、興味深いぞ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_007<tab>Ah, there you are. I've been looking all over!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_007<tab>やあ、こちらにいらっしゃいましたか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_008<tab>Thought you'd like to know that I spotted that chap you were asking about─you know, the well-muscled gentleman with tattered clothing and dazzling teeth?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_008<tab>実は、あなた方が探していた人物と、
特徴が一致するヒトを目撃したもので、報せにきました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_009<tab>You mean this gentleman? We found him, too!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_009<tab>あれれ？
でも、探していたヒルディブランド様は見つかりましたよ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_010<tab>Well, that can't be right!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_010<tab>なんと……！
まさに、あなたの姿を目撃したのですが……おかしいな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_011<tab>I just saw him in the north of Mare Lamentorum, and he ran the other way when I called out. I don't understand how he could've arrived before me...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_011<tab>ついさっき、嘆きの海の北の方で見かけ、
声をかけようとしたら、去っていったのです。
私を追い越してきたとも思えませんが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_012<tab>I have a feeling, Mister Bunny, sir, that what you saw was an impostor.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_012<tab>もしかして……ウサギさんが見たのは、
複製されたヒルディブランド様じゃないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you mind asking Mister PuPu if he was growing any more inspectors on the moon?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_013<tab>冒険者さん、コヨコヨさんに、
ほかにも複製がいるのかどうか聞いてみてください～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_014<tab>PuPu... I only created a single batch, but one did manage to escape the vaporization beam.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_014<tab>コヨコヨ……そういえば、ヒルディブランドの複製、
すべて消そうとしたけど、ひとりだけ逃げられた。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_015<tab>That individual's behavior was...unpredictable. A flaw in the cloning process, I'm afraid.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_015<tab>それ、複製するとき、失敗した個体。
だから、動きが予想外で、どこか行っちゃった。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_016<tab>Well, this won't do at all. We cannot have a flawed inspector running around besmirching the Manderville name.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_016<tab>それは、困りましたな……。
私の複製がどこかで勝手な真似をしてしまうと、
事件屋の看板に傷がつきかねません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_017<tab>Master PuPu, I must ask that we hunt down and liquidate my other self as soon as possible. Might we delay the search for your comrade until the deed is done?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_017<tab>一刻も早く探しだして、コヨコヨ殿に消してもらいたい。
お友達の捜索は、そのあとでも構いませんかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_018<tab>PuPu... The imperfect clone was of my making. It is only right that I redress my mistake first.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_018<tab>コヨコヨ……もとはといえば、ボクのミス。
もちろん、それで大丈夫。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_019<tab>So begins “The Case of the Impostor Inspector”!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_019<tab>それでは、私の複製の捜索に向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_020<tab>Ooh, that does sound exciting. If you don't mind me coming along, I can show you the place where I saw the <var 1A 02 /var>impostor inspector<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_020<tab>用事も済んだところなので、私も協力しますよ。
ひとまず、目撃した場所、嘆きの海の北へ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_025<tab>Zzz... <snort>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_025<tab>スースー…………。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_026<tab>I wonder what other nefarious abilities this so-called “amicable” alien is hiding.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_026<tab>この異星人は、果たしてどんな能力を秘めているのか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_027<tab>PuPu... My ship's matter duplication facility is prone to the occasional glitch. I should probably have that looked at...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_027<tab>コヨコヨ……複製機能、たまに誤作動起こす。
迷惑かけて、ごめん。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_100_028<tab>It was right around here...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_100_028<tab>目撃した場所はこの辺りです……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_030<tab>I espy with my little eye...no dashingly defective gentlemen.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_030<tab>ふむ、付近には私らしき紳士の姿は見当たりませんな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_031<tab>He can't have made it that far on foot. Why don't we try searching the immediate area? Scan the horizon, that kind of thing?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_031<tab>まだそう遠くへは行っていないと思いますが、
ここら辺を探す必要がありそうですね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_032<tab>Then I suggest we split up so we can cover more ground. Nashu, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I will investigate the northwest.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_032<tab>だとしたら、二手に分かれますか？
私はナシュと冒険者殿と共に、北西に向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_033<tab>Right. I'll take these other two and head northeast.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_033<tab>では、私は残りのおふたりと共に、北東を捜索します。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_034<tab>Splitting the party <var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>!? And you're leaving me with the <var 1A 02 /var>aliens<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_034<tab>ええッ！？
私が異星人たちといっしょに……ッ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_035<tab>Oh, relax, bright eyes. We'll have a nice chat, and I can disabuse you of all those strange conspiratorial notions. Oh, and we can get to know our new friend here!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_035<tab>いいじゃないですか。
この際、ゆっくり話して誤解を解きたいところでした。
新たなご友人とも親睦を深めたいですしね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_036<tab>Let us be on our way as well. With <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in the van, if you please!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_036<tab>それでは、我々も出発しましょう。
ここのエスコートは、冒険者殿に任せますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>Hildibrand and Nashu are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>ヒルディブランドたちが「同行」を開始します。
クエストを進行させるには、同行者たちが近くにいる状態で、
目的を達成する必要があります。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_038<tab>You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_038<tab>「同行」は、エリアを移動した場合や、
「同行状態を解除する」を選んだ場合に解除されます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>解除した場合、もとの場所に戻った同行者に話しかけることで、
再び「同行」させることができます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>A goldsmithing hammer is lodged in the thinker's carcass. It appears to have been dealt a single, swift killing blow.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>彫金ハンマーが刺さっている。
どうやら、これが致命傷になったようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_041<tab>Cor, the bugs grow big up here, don't they!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_041<tab>何か変な虫が倒れてます～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_042<tab>This h-hammer... Surely it cannot be─ Nay, it does not bear thinking about.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_042<tab>こ、このハンマーは、まさか……
いや、月にいるわけがない、きっと何かの間違い……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_043<tab>Come along! Nothing to see here!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_043<tab>どうやら、私の複製とは関係がないようです。
先に向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_Q1_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_001<tab>Talk.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_001<tab>話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_002<tab>Part ways.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_002<tab>同行状態を解除する

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A1_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_050<tab>Being on the moon reminds me of that time I was blasted all the way to Dalamud. I do believe that was a personal best in terms of distance flung.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_050<tab>月といえば、その衛星である、
ダラガブに飛んでいったことを思い出しますな。
あれが私の最長飛行記録ですぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_051<tab>When you're up in the sky, our world's a pizza pie, oh so pretty～♪
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_051<tab>空に浮かんだ、青いお月様がきれいです～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A6_000_004<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the Cradle of Darkness.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A6_000_004<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>「闇の揺り籠」について話す<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_060<tab>Behold this sublime vista! 'Tis as if the moon herself breathes beneath our feet!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_060<tab>月の息吹を感じる、素晴らしき絶景ですな……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_061<tab>Oh, look down there─they have their very own hot spring!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_061<tab>崖下から、温泉が出てます～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_062<tab>My dear Nashu, what you are observing is no hot spring, but a natural reservoir of ceruleum! With such a rich resource to hand, it is no wonder they can afford these palatial residences!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_062<tab>ハッハッハ、あれは温泉ではありません、ナシュ。
天然資源の青燐水が噴き出しているのです！
だから、月の方はお金持ちで、大きなお屋敷を持てるのですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_063<tab>I'm glad you're here to educate me, Inspector! I was about to take a quick soak!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_063<tab>さすが、ヒルディブランド様です～！
何でも知ってるんですね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A6_000_005<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the starry sky.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A6_000_005<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>「星」について話す<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_070<tab>What a dazzling display of stars!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_070<tab>なんと美しい、満天の星空ですな……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_071<tab>Not a single cloud in sight. In fact, I've never seen the night sky so clearly.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_071<tab>雲ひとつない、とってもきれいな夜空です～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_072<tab>Now that you mention it, it's been nighttime the entire time I've been here. How much longer until dawn breaks, do you think...?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_072<tab>そういえば……。
ここに連れてこられてから、ずっと夜のままな気がしますぞ。
朝はまだこないのでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>同行状態を解除します。本当によろしいですか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_081<tab>Haha! No rest for the adventurous, is there? We shall await your return at our previous rendezvous point. I wouldn't wish for you to miss anything!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_081<tab>ハッハッハ、冒険者殿も忙しそうですな。
構いませんよ、ナシュと先ほどのところでお待ちしておりますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>An errand? Please, go ahead! I'll be safe and sound with the inspector around!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>冒険者さん、どこかに用事ですか～？
ヒルディブランド様といっしょに、さっきのところに戻ってます～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_090<tab>Ah, my loyal associate! Let us resume the search for my ephemeral twin!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_090<tab>お待ちしておりました！
さあ、私の複製の探索を再開しますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_091<tab>Welcome back! Hopefully the impostor inspector hasn't gotten too much of a lead on us!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_091<tab>お帰りなさい、冒険者さん。
それじゃあ、ヒルディブランド様の複製を探しましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>You must be accompanied by Hildibrand and Nashu, and have them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
ヒルディブランドとナシュ・マカラッカが同行している状態で、
さらに、プレイヤーの近くにいる必要があります。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_100_092<tab>Have you noticed a sudden absence of cheerful confusion? Where is Nashu?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_100_092<tab>おや、ナシュはどこでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_100_093<tab>Did we lose the inspector? Don't tell me he's gone missing again...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_100_093<tab>あれれ、ヒルディブランド様がいませんよ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>A companion has yet to arrive. Be sure they are both at your side before attempting to continue.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>同行者がまだ到着していない。
近くまで迎えにいって、ともに話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_100_093<tab>A companion has yet to arrive. Be sure they are both at your side before attempting to continue.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_100_093<tab>同行者がまだ到着していない。
近くまで迎えにいって、ともに探索しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>Another goldsmithing hammer, another killing blow that bespeaks unparalleled strength...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>彫金ハンマーが刺さっている。
こちらも、それが致命傷になったようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_101<tab>Aw, it looks like he's yawning. The hammer stuck in his head spoils the effect, though.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_101<tab>また、何かが倒れてます～。
よく見たら、かわいいお顔をしてますよ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_102<tab>He cannot be here... Why would he be here...?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_102<tab>ま、またも、ハンマーが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_103<tab>That's a goldsmithing tool, isn't it? It does look awfully familiar...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_103<tab>あれれ？
この彫金ハンマーってもしかして～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_104<tab>And y-yet completely unrelated to our case! Moving on, people, moving on!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_104<tab>こ、これも私の複製とは関係がないようです！
ほかを当たりましょう……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>A set of gentlemanly tracks leads to the northwest...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>紳士的な足跡が、北西へと続いている……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_111<tab>Aha! In the sand, in the snow, or in a half-ilm of moondust, I'd recognize those fancy footprints anywhere! They're a perfect copy of mine.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_111<tab>これは……私の靴の跡と同じですぞ！
複製の足跡に間違いありません！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_112<tab>Our fugitive impostor must be just up ahead!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_112<tab>目標は近い、足跡が続くこの先に向かいましょう……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_200<tab>I sense a gentlemanly presence. He is close. Very close.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_200<tab>紳士的な気配を感じますぞ。
きっとこの辺りに、私の複製がいるはず……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_201<tab>No clones in the northeastern quadrant...that we could see.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_201<tab>北東には、それらしき姿は見当たりませんでした。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_202<tab>That's clever! Mister PuPu can scout for us from the air!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_202<tab>コヨコヨさんも来たようですね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>Aha! I found...me!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>私を発見しましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_000_204<tab>(-Hildiclone-)Why? Why did I flee?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_000_204<tab>(-複製されたヒルディブランド-)ああ……不覚です……。
なぜ、あのとき逃げてしまったんでしょう……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_205<tab>He seems sad. Downcast. Very un-inspector-like.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_205<tab>ヒルディブランド様、何だか変です～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_206<tab>A flawed creation, to be sure. Such negative emotions would never mar the heart of a true Manderville man.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_206<tab>明らかな失敗作ですな。
あの振る舞いは、私らしくありません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_100_206<tab>Praise Thal for his patience. 'Twould seem my beloved Hildy has been awoken from his unnatural slumber...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_100_206<tab>ああ、ザル神よ、感謝します。
昏睡状態だった我が愛息子を、お救いくださったのですね……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_000_207<tab>(-Hildiclone-)Abandoning my gentleman comrades to save myself... My pride in worse tatters than my maltreated wardrobe...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_000_207<tab>(-複製されたヒルディブランド-)皆を見捨てて、自分だけ助かるなんて……
私はなんてことを……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_208<tab>My fatherly love, denied? Unthinkable! Unless...that is not my son.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_208<tab>何かおかしい……私の愛が届かない……。
あれは、我が息子ではないのか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_100_208<tab>(-Hildiclone-)Another of me survived!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_100_208<tab>(-複製されたヒルディブランド-)あれは……私……！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_100_209<tab>(-Hildiclone-)I'll not turn tail and run this time, no sir! Hildibrand to the rescue!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRANDF_100_209<tab>(-複製されたヒルディブランド-)今度こそ、逃げちゃ駄目だ……。
救わねば……！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_209<tab>Round and round, as fast as I can!♪
I can't slow down, I'm a Manderville man!♪
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_209<tab>マンダヴィィィィィィィル！
ダブルゥ～～夢幻～～闘ゥ～～舞～～ッ！！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_210<tab>Now I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> I'm dreaming. That can't possibly be real...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_210<tab>い、いまのはいったい……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_211<tab>Ah, that was a little something we were preparing to welcome the people of Etheirys. I almost forgot it was still there.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_211<tab>ヒトを歓迎するために造りかけていた機構が、
偶然にも作動したようです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_213<tab>The barrage appears to have stopped, but just look at all this junk!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_213<tab>どうやら解決したみたいですが、
ヒドい散らかりようですね……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_214<tab>Please be sure to pick up your litter before you leave. The moon belongs to everyone, you know.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GENTLELOPORRIT_000_214<tab>月はみんなのものなんですから、
ちゃんと片付けて帰ってくださいよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_212<tab>Oho...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_212<tab>……ホウ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_215<tab>Hildibrand Helidor Maximilian Manderville, how glad I am to see you up and about! Your mother will be beside herself with joy!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_215<tab>ハッハッハ！
我が息子よ、元気そうで何より！
ママも喜びますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_216<tab>I only stand before you now thanks to Nashu, who stood ever vigilant at my bedside, and to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, who ferried my soul back from across the rift.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_216<tab>それもこれも、献身的に看病してくれたナシュと、
私のタマシイを連れ戻してくれた、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿のおかげです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_217<tab>My son is indeed blessed with comrades of quality. You have my heartfelt gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_217<tab>息子を救ってくれて、本当に感謝しています。
おふたりとも、どうもありがとう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_218<tab>To you, Master PuPu, I extend my apologies─in my excitement, I fear I have broken your starship. If there is aught I can do to help effect repairs, you have only to ask.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_218<tab>そして、コヨコヨ殿。
あなたの乗り物に危害を加えてしまい、申し訳ございません。
もし壊れてしまったのなら、私に何なりとお申し付けください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_219<tab>PuPu... My vessel experienced a temporary malfunction, but there was no major structural damage.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_219<tab>コヨコヨ……宇宙船、
一時的に誤作動起こしただけ、問題ない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_220<tab>It brings me relief and joy to hear it.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_220<tab>それはよかった、安心しました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_221<tab>Ahem. Might I have a word, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I had actually come to the moon in search of a certain rare ore, and by Thal's good graces, my quest has been successful.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_221<tab>ときに、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
私は月に希少な鉱石を探しにきたのですが、
つい先程、目的の品を手に入れることができましてな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_222<tab>The ore, however, is but the first step of a longer saga. Meet me back in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, and I will explain the role I wish you to play.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_222<tab>それに関連して、あなたに頼みたいことがあるのです。
後ほど、ラザハンにて話を聞いてはいただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_223<tab>Yes, I think it best we make the journey starwards. We'll not find Master PuPu's friend from up here unless someone packed an extremely efficacious spyglass! Anybody...? No? Then home it is!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_223<tab>コヨコヨ殿のお友達を探すためにも、
みなで母なる星へと戻りましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_224<tab>For years, I've chased after the supernatural and the inexplicable, but to encounter so much of it in such a short span of time... My mind still reels from the implications.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_224<tab>ずっと超常的なことを追ってきた私ですが、
ここまで驚くべきことが立て続けに起きるとは……。
途中からマヒしてしまいました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_225<tab>Yet I must keep my gaze focused beyond the veil. A chance like this comes only once in a lifetime!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_225<tab>だが、これは願ってもない取材のチャンス！
この特ダネは逃しはしません……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_230<tab>See! I told you I recognized those hammers! A good inspector never forgets a tool!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_230<tab>魔物に刺さっていた彫金ハンマーは、
やっぱり、ゴッドベルト様のものだったんですね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_231<tab>Now begins the hard work of compiling my notes into a structured account of events. There is so much to say, I may need to stretch this over several articles...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_231<tab>ひとまず、今回の取材の結果をまとめなければなりません。
盛りだくさんなので、それだけでも大仕事ですよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_232<tab>PuPu... You needn't worry about the clones returning to plague you. The vaporization ray disassembles matter on a molecular level.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_KOYOKOYO_000_232<tab>コヨコヨ……ヒルディブランドの複製、
しっかり消しておいた、もう大丈夫。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_OKKAKE_100_233<tab>Oh, uh, yes...I'm still here. That alien tried to take me away from my Miss Nashu, but as you can see, true love has prevailed!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_OKKAKE_100_233<tab>ど、どうも。
UFOに拐われて、いろいろと大変な目に遭いましたが、
何とか戻ってこられました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_OKKAKE_100_234<tab>I'll be around, as always, lurking─ahem, keeping an adoring eye on the most beautiful girl in the world. From a respectful distance, of course.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_OKKAKE_100_234<tab>これからも、ナシュさんを陰ながら見守っていくので、
どうか、俺のことは気にしないでください！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_240<tab>Ah, how lovely to be back on the star of my birth! Father did not tarry to chat, but said something about returning here with a trusted employee...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_240<tab>懐かしの星に戻ってきましたぞ！
父上は、何やら人を呼びにいったようですが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_241<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_241<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_242<tab>Well, we've no time for further familial pleasantries! Nashu and I must devote all our mental energies to “The Case of the Silent Correspondent”!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_242<tab>さっそく、私はナシュと共に、
コヨコヨ殿のお友達の捜索を開始しますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_243<tab>My keen inspector's sense impels me to begin our search in <var 1A 02 /var>that direction<var 1A 01 /var>. Make haste, my companions, for justice waits for no man! Not even one who is little and blue!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_HILDIBRAND_000_243<tab>事件屋の勘が手がかりをキャーーッチしました！
善は急げです、ハーッハッハッハ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_244<tab>Inspector, wait! Can't justice make an exception for me!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_244<tab>ヒルディブランド様、待ってください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_245<tab>His channeling appears to be remarkably effective. Fascinating. Yes, most fascinating indeed...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_245<tab>チャネリングで何かを掴んだようですね。
興味深いぞ……実に興味深い…………。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_246<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, forgive me: I seem to have been laboring under a misconception.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_246<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
私は大きな勘違いをしていたようでした。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_247<tab>After spending some time with the xeno-bunnies, it has become clear to me that they have not the slightest intention of invading our star. They are no threat to us...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_247<tab>月で小兎型異星人と<var 4A ((相互接触)) ((コンタクト)) /var>したことで、
彼らに星を侵略する気がないことは理解できました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_248<tab>...But <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> is! You know of whom I speak! That devious Master PuPu and his diabolical devices devised solely for world domination!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_248<tab>しかし……！
あの、コヨコヨと呼ばれる異星人こそ、
我々の星を狙う正真正銘の侵略者に違いありません！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_249<tab>I shall have to investigate him further to learn the intricacies of his plans, but I may require your aid─not to mention your interpretation.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_249<tab>私はこれから独自に、コヨコヨを取材していくことにしました。
その際、あなたがいてくれると大変助かります。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_250<tab>I'll even pay you a retainer fee. So please, when the time comes, join me on my quest for the <var 1A 02 /var>Truth<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_DELION_000_250<tab>もちろん、報酬はお支払いしますので、
次なる取材のときは、また協力をお願いします！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_251<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my apologies for the wait. Shall we proceed to business, then?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_251<tab>ホッホッホゥ、お待たせしました。
それでは、さっそくお話しさせてください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_252<tab>The task at hand concerns nothing less than a family legacy...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_252<tab>私の頼みというのは、ほかでもない、
我が家に古くから伝わる最強の武器……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_253<tab>The recreation of the historically significant and astronomically magnificent Manderville weapons!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_253<tab>「マンダヴィルウェポン」の製作に協力してほしいのです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_254<tab>They were the designs of a distant ancestor, you see. While the originals have long since vanished, the manual containing the secrets of their construction survived─a precious heirloom passed down through generations of Mandervilles.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_254<tab>それは、私の遠い先祖によって開発されたもの。
もはや現物こそ存在しませんが、古文書に記されたレシピが、
長年、マンダヴィル家に受け継がれてきました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A2_000_001<tab>Why the sudden passion for weaponsmithing?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A2_000_001<tab>なぜ急に武器製作を？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A2_000_002<tab>Aren't your hammers built for hammering gold?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_A2_000_002<tab>ゴッドベルトは彫金師では？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_255<tab>'Tis true that, as a goldsmith, I've had little occasion for crafting implements of war. “Why this project, and why now?” you may very well ask. Then I shall very well tell you.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_255<tab>たしかに、私は武器製作とは無縁の彫金師……
疑問に思うのも無理はありません。
その決断に至った理由をお話ししましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_256<tab>The tale begins not so long ago. I was here, in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, to discuss a deal with an up-and-coming merchant.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_256<tab>少し前のことになります。
私は新進気鋭の商人との商談のため、このラザハンを訪れていた。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_257<tab>The matter in question was an acquisition proposal. Alas, the talks soured, so I made preparations to depart. It was then that the sky burst into flame.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_257<tab>商談そのものは、実質的な買収提案であったため、
すぐに破談となり、帰路につこうとしていたのですが……
その矢先に、あの、おぞましい終末現象が発生したのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_258<tab>You know all too well what horrors followed. I did my best to defend the citizenry from the beasts which spawned, yet I could not save them all. Saved far too few, in fact.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_258<tab>私は襲いくる獣に立ち向かいましたが、
すべての人々を護ることはできず、多大なる犠牲が出ました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_259<tab>The memory of it haunted me, day and night, and I found myself unable to work. But then I heard the news of how you and your companions had ventured forth to banish this evil at its source.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_259<tab>その光景が忘れられず、仕事も手につかなくなり、
失意のどん底にいたとき……聞いたのです。
あなたが終末に立ち向かい元凶を払ったと。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_260<tab>You forged on in the face of deepest despair...and it gave me the courage to do the same!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_260<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿は、歩み続けていた。
ならば私も、立ち止まっている場合ではない……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_261<tab>I took a good, hard look in the looking glass and asked, “What can Godbert Manderville do to safeguard the people of this star?” Thus did I realize that I had both the knowledge and the skill to forge the greatest of weapons, that I might empower others to protect themselves and their fellow man.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_261<tab>かくして私は、世界平和を護るため、
自分ができることは何かと、真剣に考え始めました。
その結論こそが、マンダヴィルウェポンの製作だったのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_262<tab>So I began going down the list, acquiring the necessary materials with single-minded purpose. One of these was a goodly chunk of purest manderium ore─a metal found exclusively in meteorites, and that only rarely.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_262<tab>それからは、素材集めに奔走しました。
マンダリウムという、まれに隕石に含有する希少な金属があり、
その純度の高い鉱石が必要だったのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_263<tab>I searched high and low, scouring impact sites and consorting with kobolds, all to no avail. Then, when none was to be found on Hydaelyn, I set my sights on the moon, where I at last obtained a sizable sample.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_263<tab>世界中を探しても、なかなか見つかりませんでしたが、
月へと渡って、やっと条件に合うものが入手できました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_264<tab>Now I say, “at last,” but the list of materials goes on. If I'm to collect the rest in a timely fashion, I must employ the help of a comrade of quality!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_264<tab>とはいえ、まだ必要な素材が足りておりません。
ぜひ、その入手に力をお借りしたい！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_265<tab>When you can spare a moment from adventuring─or aiding my dear son in his inspecting─pray drop a word in the ear of my manservant here.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_265<tab>もしも、力添えをいただけるようなら、ご都合がよいときに、
こちらのマンダヴィル家の使用人に声をかけてください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_266<tab>I shall clear my schedule of trivial interruptions, and we can proceed with the recreation of a Manderville weapon forthwith!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_GODBERT_000_266<tab>さすれば、私も予定を空けて駆けつけることにしましょう。
では、よろしくお願いしますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>Meanwhile, elsewhere in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>一方  ラザハン  某所――

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_RADIANTSOLDIER04642_000_301<tab>(-Radiant Sentry-)Sound the alarum! A prisoner is escaping!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_RADIANTSOLDIER04642_000_301<tab>(-星戦士団の監視兵の声-)囚人が逃げたぞーーー！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>On solid ground, or far out of this world♪
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>異星人に  キャッチされ

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>Beyond the truth lies the weird and absurd♪
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>奇想天外  増殖

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>A beloved son♪
He's second to none♪
Our agent of enquiry─Hildibrand Manderville♪
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>父もまた  紳士的  事件屋の名は  ヒルディブランド

source: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>Definitely not an alien clone♪
target: TEXT_CHRHDB822_04642_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>知的な推理でエスコート
